Your choice of discount/upgrade:

Coming from another host? Use the code "refugee" at checkout and get 50% off for the first month, and a FREE upgrade to the NEXT plan
---
Use the code "wkram" without quotes at checkout, and receive 32MB additional RAM
---
Use the code code "wk20life" at checkout, and get 20% off your plan for life
---



All Virtual-Dedicated Servers come with the following features

:: Virtuozzo technology + PowerPanel
:: Free Setup
:: Full root access
:: Multiple OS choices (CentOS, Fedora, Debian, etc..)
:: Backups
:: SLM Memory Management
:: Free OS Reloads
:: FREE site move from your current host (if using the same control panel)
:: Custom Reserve DNS available
:: Equal Share CPU
:: Seamless upgrades/downgrades & custom a la carte addons
:: Semi-Managed

WHY WEBKORE.NET
:: In the hosting industry since 2001

:: Now hosting over 331,000 domains
